articles.title: Tokyo Paralympics: Pramod Bhagat wins historic gold medal in badminton, Manoj Sarkar bags bronze - India Today
articles.description: Tokyo Paralympics: India's Pramod Bhagat created history on Saturday as he became the country's first-ever medalist in para-badminton at the Games. He won the gold in men's singles SL3 event while Manoj Sarkar took bronze.
